mapper.select: select sum(day_limit_amt) day_limit_amt, sum(mon_limit_amt) mon_limit_amt, sum(year_limit_amt) year_limit_amt from t_self_limit where 1 = 1 and user_name=#{user_name} and date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d') >= st_dy and date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d') <= ed_dy group by user_name
mapper.insert: insert into t_sell (user_name, race_no, win_type, runner_no, bet_amt, win_rate, ret_amt) values (#{user_name}, #{race_no}, #{win_type}, #{runner_no}, #{bet_amt}, #{win_rate}, #{ret_amt})
mapper.select: select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, user_name, race_no, win_type, runner_no, bet_amt from t_sell where 1 = 1 and user_name=#{user_name} and (@rownum:=0)=0 LIMIT 1
